Accountant Job at Bottleking Limited




        
    

        
        Welcome to Bottleking Limited, the Minister of Enjoyment, at 27 Castle Rock Ave, Lekki Peninsula II, Lekki 105102, Lagos. We specialize in offering an exquisite selection of exotic wines and premium drinks. Our dedication to quality and customer satisfaction has made us a trusted name in the beverage industry. At Bottleking, we believe in celebrating life's moments with the finest drinks from around the world. Join us and experience the true taste of luxury.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accountant

Job Location: Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Bookkeeping & Reporting: Maintain accurate financial records, prepare monthly, quarterly, and annual reports.
	Accounts Management: Handle accounts payable and receivable, reconcile bank statements, and manage invoicing.
	Budgeting & Forecasting: Assist in budget preparation, financial planning, and cash flow monitoring.
	Tax & Compliance: Ensure timely filing of taxes (VAT, PAYE, WHT, CIT), and compliance with statutory requirements.
	Inventory & Costing: Work with procurement and warehouse teams to track stock, monitor cost of sales, and support periodic stock audits.
	Internal Controls: Implement checks to ensure financial accuracy and prevent errors/fraud.
	Audit & Liaison: Support internal and external audits, liaise with auditors, banks, and regulatory bodies.
	Management Support: Provide financial insights and recommendations to management for business growth.


Requirements


	Candidates should possess an OND / HND / B.Sc Degree with 0–2 years of experience in retail, warehousing, or customer service.
	Strong attention to detail, honesty, and good communication skills.
	Proximity to Osapa London


What We Offer


	Competitive salary.
	Staff discounts on premium drinks.
	Career growth and training opportunities.
	A vibrant, youthful, and supportive work environment.
	13th month
	HMO
	A fun, youthful, and innovative work environment.


Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV and Cover Letter to: hr@bottleking.ng using the Job Position as the subject of the mail (e.g., Application – Accountant).
